jobDescription: Position Summary: Systems Specialist is responsible for assisting with the implementation and proactive maintenance of all aspects of our clients’ technology. Act as a technical lead in selected service projects such as implementations, upgrades and relocations. Other responsibilities include troubleshooting service impacting issues, hardware/software installations and upgrades.As a Systems Specialist you will also be responsible for assisting Client Technology Managers and Senior Engineers to evaluate current infrastructure and create technology opportunities that will enable a client and ECI to be successful. Systems Specialists will regularly interface with high profile financial industry clients on a day to day basis thus requiring the highest level of presentation, communication and professionalism. Communicating and interfacing with various internal departments.
